content.rendered:
Rooms & Suites

Warmth. Care. Peace.

Comfortable Rooms & Space
Explore our refined accommodation options and find the perfect space for your stay.

Each room is an oasis of comfort, boasting a luxurious bathroom fitted with an invigorating rain shower — an invitation to relax and renew. With complimentary WIFI, remain connected at your leisure, while the tranquil ambiance of our rooms offers the perfect escape from the outside world, reuniting you with the serene embrace of nature.

Check In: 2:00 pm
Check Out: 11:00 Am
From ₹8,800

Rhododendron Suite

Riverside Eco-Luxury | 391 sq ft | Up to 3 Guests
  • 391 ft2
  • 3 Guests
  • 1 Beds
  • 1 Bathroom

Experience the serene melody of the river in our Rhododendron Suite, where eco-friendly opulence meets the soothing presence of nature. Covering a generous 391 square feet, this suite has been crafted with the eco-conscious traveler in mind, offering space for up to three guests to relax and rejuvenate with a picturesque river view.

Discover More
From ₹6,300

Wildflower Nook

Cozy Riverside Haven | 216 sq ft | Up to 2 Guests
  • 216 ft2
  • 2 Guests
  • 1 Bed
  • 1 Bathroom

Nestled along the river’s edge, the Wildflower Nook provides an intimate connection with the environment complemented by the comforts of luxury living. With 216 square feet, this eco-friendly space can host up to two guests, offering a snug retreat with delightful views of the river’s ebb and flow.

Discover More
Comfortable stay experience
Most popular facilities

Our dedicated concierge team is eager to enhance your visit, providing custom recommendations and tailored services to craft your perfect stay.

  • Expansive Bed
  • Bathroom with Shower
  • Spa Flip Flops
  • Free WiFi
  • Furnished Balcony
  • Laundry
  • 24-Hour Security
